content: there are so many options to customise this useful standing pencil case with a handle it s great as an easter egg hunting bag which can be used as a pencil case later on it can be used for holding pencils and stationery or just keep one to store all your crochet hooks and notions the pdf pattern goes further than the freely available video tutorial and adds ten different variations for you to make multiple different pencil cases from the same basic pattern us crochet terms skill level upper beginner yardage 150 - 200 metres / 165 -220 yards yarn any stash yarn can be yarn but dk / 8 ply /category 3 cotton yarn will give the best results
